articles.author: GK Web Desk
articles.title: Cop injured in grenade attack on Police Control Room Kashmir
articles.description: Cop injured in grenade attack on Police Control Room Kashmir  Greater KashmirView Full coverage on Google News
articles.content: "Terrorists hurled grenade at Police Control Room Kashmir, resulting in minor injuries to one police personnel. Area cordoned off. Further details shall follow, " a police spokesman said.

articles.title: Bilkis Bano Case: All 11 Life Imprisonment Convicts Released From Jail
articles.description: All the eleven convicts sentenced to life imprisonment in the 2002 post-Godhra Bilkis Bano gang rape case on Monday were released from the Godhra sub-jail after the Gujarat government allowed their release under its remission policy, an official said

articles.title: ‘No justice for Dalits. I quit’: Congress MLA tells Gehlot after boy’s death
articles.description: Congress legislator Pana Chand Meghwal on Sunday asked chief minister Ashok Gehlot to announce ₹50 lakh compensation for the Dalit boy’s family but did not get a response from the chief minister. | Latest News India

articles.title: 8 calls in 2 hours: How Vishnu ‘Afzal’ Bhowmik threatened to kill Mukesh Ambani, family
articles.description: The person who threatened to kill the family of industrialist Mukesh Ambani has been identified as Vishnu Bhowmik, a jeweller from South Mumbai.
articles.content: A South Mumbai jeweller, who made phone calls to a hospital and threatened to kill the family of industrialist Mukesh Ambani, called a total of eight times using a false identity. According to police… [+1158 chars]
